post.title: viera cast questions
post.content: despite searching for the answers i can't find them, so here goes i have a 2010 g20 with viera cast i am trying to find out 1 - is it possible to resize the standard video playback window - i saw a youtube demo where the initial playback window magically went to full screen but they did not show you how! 2. how do you ff/rew the video whilst in playback - i have tried the buttons that look like and at the bottom of the window - all it does is ff/rew to the next or prev video in the search list - i just want to ff/rew the individual video i am watching advice appreciated
